assertionResults.title: should extract the CSS in a simple case
should extract both global and local CSS
should not spill ServerStyleSheets into each other
should add a nonce to the stylesheet if webpack nonce is detected in the global scope
should render CSS in the order the components were defined, not rendered
should share global styles but keep renders separate
